items.sentence: Tom and Mary stared at each other with hatred.
Tom and Mary told me that they were very poor.
I\'m not sure whether Tom wants to talk to me.
I\'m not the person that should be doing this.
I\'m not used to dealing with people like Tom.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom is right about that.
When I wear a mask, my glasses get steamed up.
Tom tried to convince Mary that he\'d changed.
Even smart people are sometimes absent-minded.
Tom told Mary that John was getting remarried.
